title: ERC-20
description:
ERC-20 is one of the most important smart contract standards on Ethereum. It has become the technical standard for all smart contracts implementing fungible tokens (tokens) on the Ethereum blockchain.
ERC-20 standard functions include: transferring tokens from one account to another; obtaining the current token balance of an account; obtaining the total token supply; approving a certain amount of tokens in the account for use by a third-party account.
